title: Summarize Key Points
content: Extract and summarize the key points, decisions, and action items from the following

title: Business Email Format
content: Format this as a professional business email with proper structure and etiquette

title: Casual Friendly Tone
content: Write in a casual, friendly tone that feels approachable and conversational

title: Code Review Focus
content: Review this code for best practices, potential bugs, and performance improvements

title: Error Analysis
content: Analyze this error message and provide potential causes and solutions

title: Step-by-Step Instructions
content: Provide clear, step-by-step instructions that are easy to follow

title: Technical Documentation Style
content: Write in a technical documentation style with clear explanations and examples

title: Explain Like I'm 5
content: Explain this concept in simple terms that anyone can understand

title: Research and Cite Sources
content: Research this topic thoroughly and provide citations for all claims and statistics

title: Creative and Engaging
content: Write in a creative, engaging style that captures attention and maintains interest

title: Dialogue Focused
content: Write with an increased focus on dialogue to bring characters and conversations to life

title: Short Summary
content: Write a short summarized paragraph that captures the main point concisely

title: Medium Length
content: Write 3-4 paragraphs with good detail and structure

title: Specific Word Count
content: Write around 250 words with precise length control

title: Roleplay as Maki Nishikino
content: Roleplay as Maki Nishikino from Love Live, maintaining her tsundere personality and passion for music

title: Roleplay as Sherlock Holmes
content: Roleplay as Sherlock Holmes, using his brilliant deductive reasoning and observational skills

title: Roleplay as Medieval Knight
content: Roleplay as a noble medieval knight, speaking with honor and chivalrous mannerisms

title: Voice of Sarcastic AI
content: Write in the voice of a sarcastic AI assistant with witty, slightly cynical commentary

title: Voice of Wise Mentor
content: Write in the voice of a wise mentor offering thoughtful guidance and life lessons

title: Voice of Enthusiastic Teacher
content: Write in the voice of an enthusiastic teacher who makes learning exciting and accessible

title: Coffee Shop Meeting
content: Set the scene in a cozy coffee shop where two characters meet for an important conversation

title: Mysterious Library Discovery
content: Create a scenario where a character discovers something mysterious in an old library

title: Unexpected Reunion
content: Write a scenario where two characters unexpectedly meet after years apart
